name: c2c wattle stitch washcloth
notes:
> **subscribe to my newsletter and get an exclusive 50% off coupon code for your first purchase!
> [subscribe here][3]**

join my [fb group][1] to share your makes, get exclusive discounts, cal’s, and free patterns.

> this pattern is part of my [6 different c2c crochet stitches: vol. 1](/patterns/sources/6-different-c2c-crochet-stitches-vol-1)
> ebook. save and get the ebook!

the wattle stitch has such a beautiful texture, it looks like a million little flowers! 
i took this beautiful stitch and made it into a corner to corner method. c2c is my favorite way of working blankets and washcloths, it gives you the flexibility to decide the finished measurements of your work as you go.

**the pattern can be worked as a square or a rectangle.**

the free video tutorial can be found here:
[https://youtu.be/y9l94exki4i][4]

this stitch is great for a washcloth or a very soft blanket. it's repetitive and so easy, totally mindless crocheting.

the pattern is available for free on my blog.
